name: jhunt
text: Why are the cooking-related strips so awesome?  THey just are.

name: greymantledwolf
text: because you expect something funny/banal and instead get high end knowledge (which is funny)?

name: straw
text: I, for one, never stopped laughing in my philosophy courses.

name: belgand
text: The maxim of my action is to laugh at Kant for being a silly little bullshit man. I sincerely hope this becomes a universal law.

name: nice-on-water
text: Let's all take a minute to agree with this statement.

name: nice-on-water
text: Let's leave this...bum.

name: ambala
text: Because they are always RIGHT ON

name: mortshire
text: most people don't, but the stuffed bear DOES.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: Only the manliest men can cook like that

name: obvious
text: This gets a bonus point just for Philippe spinning around.

name: never_die
text: Teodor is so eager to impress Ray, he wakes up from a nap, startlingly fast.

name: confusion
text:
I dunno about that. It could also be more of a reflection of Teodor's unexpected food-attunedness - to me, it felt like his ears must have perked up and roused him from sleep when he heard Ray talking about cooking; that's the way the timing seems to make the most sense.

But what do I know - I'm going through the archives in order, so this isn't even my hundredth strip yet.

name: johnnyrocker
text:
He was clearly masturbating.
I'm not making a joke here, guys.
He was masturbating. I am sure of this.

name: riazm
text: Teodor debugs a tartare.

name: garyos
text: A comment left by garyos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, rowboat, farqussus, J-Man, aperson)

name: equinn2006
text: Toasted sesame seeds are ALWAYS better.

name: feetnotes
text: A comment left by feetnotes was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by rascaldom, aquamuffin, Sprog, wigglestick, mattylite)

name: joeyramoney
text: A comment left by joeyramoney was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by rowboat, rascaldom, aquamuffin, mattylite)

name: _cheesekayke
text: A comment left by _cheesekayke was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by SSDDR, VictoriaW, EndOfTheWorld)

name: fineoakstructure
text: A comment left by fineoakstructure was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Carpetbag, rowboat, nonstopdancer, rascaldom, Audhumla, peterjoel)

name: fineoakstructure
text: Have the people who lamed this comment not seen the Achewood Cookbook?  This explicit instruction comes from the man himself, and it is completely honest and good.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Hey! Fuck you, rowboat and mattylite. (I don't recognize any of the other fuckers who lamed my two comments above.)

Also, bourbon is a good thing but limiting myself to, at best, 4 hours of sleep before my only work day this week is not a good thing but bourbon makes it seem like it is so. It'd be awesome if I was partying but I'm just sitting up here on assetbar and listening to uh Camera Obscura right now. Not partying.

name: a386
text: yeah exactly it's these little slice of life strips that make us all feel like we know the characters as well as we do

name: raging_cow
text:
joey was being sarcastic
iiiimbeciles

name: heccibiggs
text:
I figured it was because it was showing how Teodor still has this sort of mancrush on Ray, and he may be dozing in bed but when he hears Ray's around and looking for his help, he immediately jumps to attention.

And that is what I figure.

name: dtuba
text: Yes. Teodor is still haunted by the Ketel One Question

name: dtuba
text: or, rather, this .

name: naughtybyn8ture
text: toasted sesame seeds would be better

name: hcaz
text: Damn, that's a good idea. Gets me every time.

name: farqussus
text: how many times has it got you?

name: tekende
text: Over 9,000!

name: blitztrug
text:
come on tekende

you are better than that

name: hamscout
text:
If Ray
can
cook,
so
can
YOU!

name: saulbellow
text:
Anyone else weirded out by the order of the dialog in the first two strips?

Hey little guy, you seen Teodor?

Hi Ray!

I got issues with a dish I'm makin'.

Teodor is taking a nap.

name: woodenteeth
text: Sounds about right for a five year old. Conversation is a mutual activity but it's more of a information-trade than a question-answer sorta deal.

name: hifihero
text: Word

name: arelladawn
text: I would actually not be bored if every strip was like this

name: especial
text:
Agreed. But. There are also so many other great strips that are not like this, that I would regret that lack.

I feel like I shouldn't be using the word 'regret' in this context, but there it is. What can I say?

name: puguglypress
text: I would certainly prefer it to some of the recent strips!

name: shrewbie
text: Sleeping is nothing to be embarrassed about, we all do it
